title: By far THE BEST calendar app
content:
I highly recommend the Jorte calendar app. Iâ€™ve been using it for several years now and I am still as excited to use it as I was on the day I discovered it. 

There is no other calendar app out there that is even remotely comparable. Jorte lets you adjust everything: the colors, fonts, background, wallpapers, icons, etc. You can adjust everything to truly make it the best fit for you. 

They also offer way more icons than all the other calendar apps, and it is super easy to just add them to your calendar as an appointment or as a reminder. They come out with new icon packs regularly, and their icon packs truly are little works of art (many of them are designed by the amazing artist at HJ-Story). 

In addition to offering tons of features, a high degree of flexibility, and super cute icons, Jorte has the best and nicest customer service. You can always reach out to them, and they even take into account wishes for future icon packs, which most apps wouldnâ€™t even think about doing.

So If youâ€™re looking for a calendar app, go with Jorte. I tried so many before I found Jorte and itâ€™s really the only one that truly checks all the boxes. LOVE my Jorte!

title: Best calendar!
content: I usually prefer a hand written planner but I never kept it with me so I tried to find something for my iPad. I tested several different ones but none had features I needed. This one is super simple but still has the complicated features I wanted. The hardest thing to find in a calendar is scheduling things biweekly. This one did it! Also love that I can sync with my husband so he can keep up with our schedules.

title: Locks up!

title: What else could you need?
content: I really don't know how they could make this app any better. Great integration with all my different calendars, several view options, see everything in your day/week/month at a glance (as opposed to useless dots)... And now they included a new feature that lets you separate and group different calendars, and view any one group at a time. I didn't even know I needed that, but what a FANTASTIC FEATURE!!! Now I can switch to my son's school calendar in an instant, but I don't have to have my regular calendar crowded with his stuff. Genius.
